game.name: Superhero Toy Shop
game.description:
Here we have great news for you! Your favorite princess Rachel has opened up the first Superhero toy store in the city. The princess looks pretty excited for her new business, but does not know how to make the arrangements to make opening grand. Could you help her out during this time? Join Superhero Toy Shop and be prepared to guide her make plan everything required to make her shop popular in the city! Follow the instructions and try to complete task as fast as you can in this brand new girls game!

Your primary motto is to help Rachel to make some cute superhero dolls with the help of items that you see at the disposal. All the dressing options will be shown on the left side of the screen. The right side of the screen will show you the doll you have to dress it up. Give her a strapless blue top with big cuts on both of the sides, half-sleeve white and blue t-shirt with a blue belt on the waist, or a sleeveless purple and blacktop and combine them up with their matching bottoms!

Make sure to complete their looks with a pair of love shoes or long boots, a cover on her eyes or a tablet in her hand. Click the next button then and get ready to help the other dolls to pick up the awesome superhero outfits in this HTML5 dressing game! Keep playing this cool online game until you create some lovely dolls for the lady! Good luck to play dress-up games online that are popular online and have fun with your friends without download games!
